name: Be nice
description: During the whole instance, be nice with your mates

name: Are we the badies?
description: During the whole instance, be mean with your mates

name: The power of the rain bow
description: Glamour with a LOT of color

name: R18
description: Glamour like in your naughtiest dreams

name: Furize
description: Glamour as a furize (Natural furize need to do it as well)

name: I'm singing in the rain
description: Any type of communication shall be done by singing, even textual

name: Pedant
description: Any type of communication shall be the more pedant possible

name: Streamer
description: Any type of communication shall be done like you're currently streaming infront of hundred of people

name: Santa
description: Before the instance, offer a small ingame gift to one of your mate
